column2: "Nna ɔdze me faa krɔnkrɔn bea abobokɛse no a ɔhwɛ boka afamu no sanee bae; na wɔtoow mu."
"Na EWURADZE see me dɛ
column3: Abobokɛse yi wɔbɔtow mu ara
column4: worummbue
column5: eso nyimpa biara rennhɛn mu nnkɔ mu
column8: na ɔahɛn mu akɔ mu; dɛm ntsi wɔbɔtow mu ara."

column2: "Na bapɔmba no dze
column3: ɔbɛtsena mu dɛ bapɔmba oedzidzi wɔ EWURADZE enyim; ɔnam abobokɛse no ne dampan kwan do bɛba mu na kwan kor noara mu na ɔnam befir edzi."

column2: "Nna ɔdze me faa kwaamu afamu abobokɛse no kwan no do baa dan no enyim; na mohwɛe
column3: na hwɛ
column4: EWURADZE n’enyimnyam ahyɛ EWURADZE ne fi no ma: na medze m’enyim butuuw famu."

column2: "Na EWURADZE see me dɛ
column3: Onyimpa ba
column4: hyɛ no nsew yie
column6: na fa w’asowa tsie dza mereka akyerɛ wo wɔ EWURADZE fi ho ahyɛdze no nyina
column7: na no ho mbra no nyina; na hyɛ fi no ne nhɛnmu ɔnye krɔnkrɔnbea no n’edzifir nyina nsew yie."

column2: "Na se etuatsewfo no
column3: Israel fifo no dɛ
column4: Mbrɛ EWURADZE Nyankopɔn se nye iyi: Ao hom Israel fifo
column5: hom mma hom atantandze ndɔɔ so mma hom
column8: akoma na honam mu monomonomfo aba dɛ wɔmbɛtsena mo krɔnkrɔnbea mu
column13: na wɔato m’ahyɛmu dze aka hom atantandze nyinara ho."

column2: "Na hom annhwɛ m’akrɔnkrɔndze ahwɛdodze no do: na mbom hom esisi mo krɔnkrɔnbea no mu ahwɛdodze no do ahwɛdofo amema hom ho."
"Mbrɛ EWURADZE Nyankopɔn se nye iyi: Ɔnanaben biara a ɔyɛ akoma na honam mu monomonomnyi no
column3: ɔrennhɛn mo krɔnkrɔnbea no mu
column4: wɔ ɔnana biara a ɔwɔ Israelmba mu no mu."

column2: "Na Levifo a wofii me nkyɛn kɔr ekyirekyir ber a Israel bɔɔ ko fii me nkyɛn
column3: wɔbɔɔ ko fii me nkyɛn kedzii hɔn abosom ekyir no; hɔnara wɔbɔsoa hɔn emumuyɛ."

column2: "Naaso wɔbɛyɛ mo krɔnkrɔnbea mu asomfo a wɔhwɛ fi no no mbobotsen ano
column3: na wɔsom wɔ fi no mu: hɔn na wɔbɔbɔ hyew afɔr na kum afɔr ama man no
column4: na wobegyina hɔn enyim wɔasom hɔn."

column2: "Osiandɛ wɔsoom hɔn wɔ hɔn abosom enyim
column3: na wɔbɛyɛɛ emumuyɛ fintsidua maa Israel fifo ntsi; mama me nsa do wɔ hɔn do
column4: EWURADZE Nyankopɔn na ɔse

column2: "Na wɔronntwe mmbɛn me mmbɛyɛ asɔfo dwuma mma me
column3: eso wɔremmbɛn m’akrɔnkrɔndze mu biara
column4: n’akrɔnkrɔndze mu akrɔnkrɔndze no a: na mbom wɔbɔsoa hɔn enyimguase
column5: na hɔn atantandze a wɔayeyɛ no."

column2: "Naaso mebɛyɛ hɔn fi no n’ahwɛdodze no do ahwɛfo
column3: wɔ no mu som nyina
column4: na dza wɔyɛ wɔ mu nyina ho."

column2: "Na asɔfo Levifo
column3: Zadokmba no a wɔhwɛɛ mo krɔnkrɔnbea ahwɛdze no
column4: ber a Israelmba bɔɔ ko fii me nkyɛn no
column5: hɔnara na wɔbɛbɛn me abɔsom me; na wobegyina m’enyim wɔdze angoa na bɔgya abɔ afɔr ama me

column2: "Wɔbɛhɛn mo krɔnkrɔnbea hɔ
column3: na woepinkyɛn m’edzidzipon ho wɔabɔsom me
column4: na wɔayɛ m’ahwɛdodze no do ahwɛfo."

column2: "Na ɔmbra dɛ sɛ wɔrehɛn fie afamu abangua no no mbobokɛse no mu a
column3: wɔnhyehyɛ ndwera ntar; na mma kuntu-tam biara nnka hɔn ho
column4: ber a wɔrosom wɔ fie afamu abangua no no mbobokɛse no mu

column2: "Wɔmfa ndwera abɔtsir mbobɔ hɔn etsir
column3: na ndwera nsiasen nsisi hɔn asen; mma wɔmmfa biribiara a ɔma mfifir mmbɔ hɔn ho do."

column2: "Na sɛ worifir edzi wɔakɔ guado afamu abangua no do wɔ man no nkyɛn a
column3: wonyiyi hɔn ntar a wɔhyɛe somee no
column4: na wɔmfa ngu mpia krɔnkrɔn no mu
column6: amma wɔaammfa hɔn ntar no annkɛtsew man no ho."

column2: "Eso mma wonnyiyi hɔn tsir
column3: anaa wonnsie tsimum; susua ara na wonsusua hɔn tsir."

column2: "Eso mma sɔfo biara nnom nsa
column3: ber a ɔrehɛn fie afamu abangua no do no."

column2: "Eso mma wɔnnwar kunafo
column3: anaa nyia wɔako no awar: na mbom wɔmfa Israel fi asefo mu mbaabun
column4: anaa kunafo a ɔyɛ sɔfo bi no kunafo."

column2: "Na wɔnkyerɛkyerɛ me man sorbi a ɔda krɔnkrɔndze na kwasafodze ntamu
column3: na wɔmma wonhu dza no ho tsew na dza no ho nntsew."

column2: "Na mansotwe mu so hɔnara na wongyina mbu atsɛn: dɛ mbrɛ m’atsɛmbu tse na wombu atsɛn: na wonsie me mbra na m’ahyɛdze wɔ me fa a wɔhyɛ nyinara mu; na wɔnyɛ n’ahomgyenda no krɔnkrɔn."
"Na mma wɔnnkɔ fun bi ho nnkogu hɔnho fi: gyedɛ egya
column3: anaa na
column4: anaa babanyin
column6: anaa akyerɛbaa a onnyae nnyaa kun
column7: na wɔwɔ ho kwan dɛ wogu hɔnho fi."

column2: "Na wɔtsew no ho wie a
column3: wɔnkan ndaesuon mma no."

column2: "Na da a ɔrokɔ krɔnkrɔnbea fie afamu abangua no do akɔsom wɔ krɔnkrɔnbea hɔ no
column3: ɔbɔ no bɔn ho afɔr
column4: EWURADZE Nyankopɔn na ɔse."

column2: "Na wobenya egyapadze; emi nye hɔn egyapadze: na mma hom mma hɔn kyɛfa wɔ Israel; emi nye hɔn kyɛfa."
"Wondzi edziban afɔr
column3: na bɔn ho afɔr
column4: na afɔdzi afɔr; na dza woehyira do ama wɔ Israel biara nyɛ hɔndze."

column2: "Na adze biara mu nduadzewakan nyinara mu dza odzi kan no
column3: na adze biara mu ayɛyɛdze nyinara ho ayɛyɛdze biara
column4: nyɛ asɔfo no dze: hom mfa hom mbɔr a odzi kan no so mma sɔfo no
column5: ma ɔaama nhyira aba wo fi do."

column2: "Mma asɔfo no nndzi dza noara oewu
column3: anaaso wɔatsetsew no mu biara
column4: sɛ anoma o
